scripts.migrate:refresh: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npm run migrate
scripts.migrate: node database/createdb.js && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && node database/grantPrivileges.js
scripts.seed:refresh: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && node database/clearFunctionsAndViews.js && npm run seed
scripts.seed: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --debug && node database/storedFunctions.js && npm run seedmongoandneo
scripts.initdb: npm run alldb && npm run seed
